name: Bank Smasher - Beat The Boss
description:
A bank robber is at its never ending rage to smashdown city bank. This time the robber is aiming to relieve stress by destroying and smashing each and every single entity of bank. It is time for you to be that bank heist guy and free yourself from depression and frustration in this amazing smashing and stress relief game Bank Smasher - Beat The Boss. Find, hit, breakdown and smash office of bank, along with everything that comes on your way in bank. Overcome the mess you are experiencing in your life and turn your bad day into good day .

Grab your gun tight and set off for fps shooting to hit, shoot and break down everything of bank interior that comes on your way. Enter into the bank hall and aim to demolish the bank by shooting at all the luxurious items of banks like corridor lamps, expensive statues, laptops, vintage handmade vase, furniture,tv and a lot more for your stress relief in all new Bank Smasher - Beat The Boss. Enter rage room to for stress reliever experience and blow steam of torture chamber by taking out all the grudge and say goodbye to your depression and stress.

In this Bank Smasher - Beat The Boss stress relief game you have to enter the bank and set your target on the objects of banks (similar to the ones displayed in the picture provided) on shooting and wrecking every correct object our amazing fps shooter will score 50+ and 100+ on each wrecked and smashed expensive stuff of bank that you have wrecked and smashed. Any extra destruction caused other than the displayed images will provide you with additional score as bonus.

The smashing continues in each level, whereby you have to look for provided expensive objects of banks, hit and wreck different targeted things in each respective bank smashing game mission. There are total 10 levels of Bank Smasher - Beat The Boss each giving you completely different stress reliever experience in bank rage room; in each level you have to achieve certain target of scores within one minute as time limit. If one fails to do so, well then, your bad luck! You’ll have to get more angry and crazy next time to be the highest scorer and mad person to hit and smash things in order to be listed amongst best stress reliever players in the leaderboard.

What’s the wait for now? Get ready for stress releasing game to shoot all objects like a crazy person.

Game Features:

Stress relief smash game
Smash and wreck everything
Target objects as amazing fps shooter
HD 3D Graphics with amazing bank environment
Smooth and intuitive controls
Interesting game play
HQ sound effects
